data.actual_result: I cant hear them speaking. After rejoining and leaving the VC repeatedly.
data.expected_result: The person speaking should be heard clearly.
data.short_description: two people with priority speaker doesnt work
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a server - Join a voice channel - Make a role - Put Priority Speaker on it - Assign it to 2 different people - Make them both join the same voice channel - Have one speak at a time - Watch
